summary: This bill, the Disaster Relief Disbursement Accountability Act, aims to expedite the disbursement of funds related to disaster relief. It amends the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to require the Administrator to take actions ensuring swift fund distribution to eligible entities, including those involved in hazard mitigation and public assistance programs. It mandates recipients of disaster assistance to report on their disbursement timelines and requires the Administrator to report to Congress on the collected information.
